free.name: Free
free.note: The free package allows for up to 100, 00 free transaction per day, if the amount is exceeded the client will pay a fee per extra transaction a fee of $0.002 per kb for incoming and $0.005 per kb for outgoing transmissions or upgrade to another package.

basic.name: Basic
basic.note: The basic package allows for up to 500, 00 transaction per day, if the amount is exceeded the client will pay a fee per extra transaction a fee of $0.001 per kb for incoming and $0.003 per kb for outgoing transmission or upgrade to another package.

premium.name: Premium
premium.note: The premium package allows for up to 1, 000, 00 transaction per day for 100 users, if the amount is exceeded the client will pay a fee per extra transaction a fee of $0.001 per kb for incoming and $0.002 per kb for outgoing transmission or upgrade to another package.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.note: The enerprise package allows for unlimited transaction per day for 200 users with unlimited users and transmissions
